translation: By killing these sons of Dhritarashtra, what pleasure could be ours, O Janardana? Only sin would accrue to us from killing these felons.
commentary: 1.36 slain having slain? Dhritarashtra sons of Dhritarashtra? Nah to us? What's the what? Preetih pleasure? Maybe may be? Janardana Or Janardana? Papam sin? Eve only? Ashrayet would take hold? us to us? killing having killed? Etan these? The attackers are felons.Commentary Janardana means one who is worshiped by all for prosperity and salvation -- Krishna.He who sets fire to the house of another? who gives poison?
